lead_paragraph: MAY--Walter Frank, of Boca Raton, FL and New York City died March 18. Born December 10, 1948, in New York City to William and Eleanor Sichel May. Loving husband of Robin Silber May; devoted father to William (fiancee, Melissa Myers) and Eugene; brother to Thomas May (wife Helen); beloved uncle. A graduate of Collegiate School in New York and Lafayette College in Easton, PA, he was an avid reader, golfer and collector of art who always enjoyed a good meal, good company and a nice stiff drink. Visiting hours will be 6 to 8pm Wednesday, March 23 at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 91st Street and Amsterdam Ave. Funeral service will be noon March 24 at Temple Israel Cemetery in Hasting-on-Hudson. The family will be sitting Shiva at their New York home Friday beginning at 12:30pm. Contributions may be made to Boca Raton Regional Hospital. He will be sorely missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAY, WALTER FRANK
